Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.17-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.17-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nmi is earlier than 1.8.17-1, affected by CVE-2022-41717
